judges: Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Judgment affirmed.
Mr. Justice Roberts would grant a new trial because of error in the trial court’s charge.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Harry A. Englehart, Jr., with him Thomas B. Steiger, for appellant.
casebody.head_matter:
Ratzesberger, Appellant, v. Rockwell.
Argued April 23, 1965.
Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.
Harry A. Englehart, Jr., with him Thomas B. Steiger, for appellant.
George S. Black, for appellee.
June 30, 1965:
